name: fe_03_00056
context_text: <B> well there's fewer of them around but but they are still there but i think that um legislation and all is making it so difficult now for people to smoke at least in the united states smoking at public place that it's hard for people to be extremely rude and get away with it at least { in a public place } / <A> [ mhm ] / <B> you know because even even in a place where where smoking is allowed if you're in just sitting in anti- or non-smoking section and there's someone sitting in the smoking section that their smoke is bothering you you can ask and have them moved you know and there's something that says you know they have to be you know so far from smoke and what have you so so it's getting harder it's getting better but it's i know for a fact that um my sister just went overseas and she was in italy and you know there's no any sort of laws against smoking or anything like that and she said it's just it's just everywhere it's like we were here twenty years ago / <A> yeah / <B> it's just absolutely everywhere and there's no getting away from it and coming form an area where there is quite a bit less of it and you can't say anything to anybody you can't say you know could you please move because if you're not smoking / <A> right / <B> you're in the minority / <A> right
